replies.body: Welcome to the family, i always knew you'd join us!

rofl 

 "but has many negative effects on the community. Boosting produces unbalanced games, devalues the commitment many players make to earn their rankings,"

Don't take the moral high ground, smurfing does the exact same thing and you do nothing to stop that.

Smurfs generally pass through quickly, and you may run into one every 5 or so games, with a 50% chance they help you (are on your side). Boosted accounts take ages to decay back down to real level and destroy the game for longer at the same level.

"and you may run into one every 5 or so games, "

 Lol can you please tell me where you're getting that statistic from? Because I have multiple smurfs, my friends all have multiple smurfs, everyone I know has at least 1 second account they can play on.

"with a 50% chance they help you (are on your side)."

Yeah and a 50% chance they can destroy you. Just like vsing a boosted account will give you 50% chance that you'll crush them, thus "helping" you. What's your point? No matter how you word it it's still producing an unbalanced game, which is what you complained about.
Mind you Pro's who tank accounts just so they can smack around bronzies need to have a special place in elo hell set aside for them....
Logged in to upvote this tbh.
And they will continue doing nothing about it, because "all the pros do it".
Coz riot u only pay them $200 a week.... THATS LESS THAN CENTRELINK and these guys gotta scrim hours for that much.... i bad ban.... couldve been easily prevented if you support the pros more
lmao he probably makes a lot more money boosting other people than playing LoL himself.
O C E B O Y S

This one ban is going to do nothing to the greater picture Riot you guys have to take the BOOSTERS down from the source Its obvious all these pros are using oceboosting and yet you do NOTHING to stop them. every game i have to vs ppl going 25/2 advertising oceboosting in all chat in PLAIN SIGHT and im sick of it. if oceboosting does not go down or 'oce pros' are not paid more these pro players are going to continue making more money boosting its as simple as that.

A case could be made that people like yourself that play against much higher level players could be beneficial, learn from what he did good then you may also git gud kid... Also damn "every game" you have to deal with 1 or more elo boosters, jeeze sounds super realistic.
